name: @giro3d/giro3d
description: A JS/WebGL framework for 3D geospatial data visualization

scripts._build-site-theme: shx mkdir -p build/site/assets && shx mkdir -p build/site/assets/fonts && npx sass site/bootstrap-custom.scss:build/site/assets/bootstrap-custom.css site/index.scss:build/site/assets/index.css && shx cp node_modules/bootstrap/dist/js/bootstrap.bundle.min.js build/site/assets && shx cp -r node_modules/bootstrap-icons/font/fonts/* build/site/assets/fonts && shx mkdir -p build/site/images && shx cp -r graphics/* build/site/images
scripts._build-static-site: shx mkdir -p build/site && npm run _build-site-theme && shx cp site/*.html build/site/ && shx cp graphics/favicon* build/site/
scripts._build-tutorials: shx mkdir -p build/site/ && docco examples/getting-started.js --css site/docco.css -s github-light -l parallel -t site/getting-started.ejs --output build/site/ && shx mv build/site/examples build/site/tutorials
scripts._transpile: shx rm -rf build/giro3d && shx mkdir -p build/giro3d && shx cp -rf src build/giro3d/src && cross-env BABEL_DISABLE_CACHE=1 babel --extensions .ts,.js src --out-dir build/giro3d
scripts.build-apidoc: shx rm -rf build/site/apidoc && tsc -p doc && shx rm -rf build/site/apidoc && typedoc
scripts.build-package: npm run _transpile && npm run _generate-type-definitions && node tasks/prepare-package.mjs
scripts.build-site: shx rm -rf build/site && npm run _build-static-site && npm run build-apidoc && npm run _build-tutorials && npm run build-examples
scripts.lint: npm run lint-doc && npm run _check-folders && npm run lint-eslint
scripts.make-package: npm run build-package && npm pack build/giro3d/
scripts.serve-apidoc: npm run build-apidoc && npm run _build-site-theme && shx cp build/site/assets/* build/site/apidoc/assets/ && shx cp -r build/site/images build/site/apidoc/images && concurrently --kill-others "typedoc --watch --cleanOutputDir false" "npx http-server build/site/apidoc"
scripts.serve-examples: npm run build-examples && npm run _build-site-theme && concurrently --kill-others "npm run watch" "webpack serve --config examples/webpack/config.mjs --mode=production"
scripts.serve-site: npm run build-site && npx http-server build/site/
scripts.start: npm run build-examples:dev && npm run _build-site-theme && concurrently --kill-others "npm run watch" "webpack serve --config examples/webpack/config.mjs --mode=development"
scripts.test: npm run lint -- --max-warnings=0 && npm run build && npm run test-with-coverage
